explanation: [0-0] In a room, a little boy dressed as an angel in a white short-sleeved shirt, wearing angel wings and a halo, faces forward with his eyes closed, a long red and green candy in his mouth. Behind him is a blue wall with flowers and a red sofa.

[0-4] The little boy continues to savor the candy in his mouth with his eyes closed, as a right hand holding yellow scissors extends from the right side of the screen, cutting off the candy he is eating. The little boy opens his eyes and looks to the right in surprise. The scene switches to a lady dressed as a devil with long black hair, wearing a red devil horn headband and a red dress. The lady holds a white sign that reads "No Lollipops," her mouth slightly pouting, her eyes narrowed, and she keeps tapping the sign with her finger, looking serious.
